title: UGC-NET Paper 1 Full Course
description: Complete coverage of Teaching Aptitude, Research, ICT, and Higher Education units.

title: Modern & Post-Modern British Lit
description: Comprehensive study of the 20th and 21st century British literary landscape.

title: Mastering Literary Theory
description: From Structuralism to Post-Colonialism. In-depth analysis for exam aspirants.

title: English Drama & Poetry Essentials
description: Major works from Chaucer to the Present. Focused on key stylistic and thematic elements.

title: Indian Literature in English
description: History, major authors, and key texts from the Indian subcontinent.

title: English Language Teaching (ELT)
description: Theories, methods, and the history of English in India for the UGC-NET syllabus.

title: Introduction to Cultural Studies
description: Exploring high-yield topics in Cultural Studies, Media, and Popular Culture.

title: American & Postcolonial Lit
description: Major American classics integrated with Postcolonial perspectives.
